value:
$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|Hee-hee-hee! All I have to do now is
get the goods! I've already won!$k$pI don't understand why she considers
this a treasure, but...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|That smile! Indomitable glee! Cath
already has it!$k$pOh, Kagero... What do I do?$k$p$nMPID_カゲロウ|It's simple. You must investigate and
identify Cath's treasure. What other
path is open?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗リカード,ch01_51_Ricard_M_Thief22,Face|Ooo, things are getting intense! But
these two have forgotten the point of
a festival—to kick back and relax!$k$pDon't you think so, Sothe?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗サザ,ch11_02_Sothe_M_Thief22,Face|Search me.$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Thief22,Face|Or don't! Yeah, don't.$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗リカード,ch01_51_Ricard_M_Thief22,Face|I wasn't going to search— What's
got you so worked up all of
a sudden, Leila?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|You didn't run off. I'll give you credit
for that.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|Cath...$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|Did you get your treasure? Because
I sure did! You won't know what hit
you!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|This... This... *squeal*$k$pThis book? I thought it was a legend!
The artist isn't even FROM this world!$k$pAnd this one... I've never even heard
of it... And this... And THIS... There
are so many here! How? HOW?!$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|Truth is, I special ordered them from
an Anna. Not the commander, but a
merchant.$k$pThey didn't cost much, but it looks
like they really are treasures to you.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|Urgh... You win, Cath. There's no way
I can compete.$k$pThese truly are the greatest treasure
I can imagine...$k$p$nMPID_カゲロウ|Pull it together! You worked hard,
didn't you? Show her!$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|If you brought something, I'll take a
look. It would be a waste not to.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|Well, OK. Here.$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|What is this? A bundle of papers?
This is a treasure?$k$pWait a second... Are these...$k$p$WmMPID_カゲロウ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|Where you come from, you gave the
things you stole to the poor, did you
not?$k$pI put in a request with
$Nu...$k$pThese letters are from the people
you helped.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|Back when I was a thief, I did the
same thing you did with what I
stole.$k$pI still treasure all the letters of
appreciation I got...$k$pI thought you would too.$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|It's not like I did what I did because
I wanted to be thanked for it.$k$pI don't need these letters.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|Ooo, a tough girl? Look at you!
You're sniffling. I see those tears!
You're not so tough, are you?$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|Shut up!$k$p$WmMPID_カゲロウ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|So who won?$k$p$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|I guess it's a tie. It seems that Cath
and I both got something good.$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|Agreed. I hate to admit it, but you
did make me cry. Not bad, Nina,
not bad.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_FF_Pair,Face|Not bad yourself! You made for a
worthy opponent!$k$pIf you want to be friends, though...
We'll have to do something even
more stimulating one of these days.$k$pKagero! Can you carry these? I have
this stack...$k$p$nMPID_カゲロウ|Oof! So heavy...$k$p$nMPID_比翼エポニーヌ|See you around, Cath!$k$p$WmMPID_怪盗キャス,ch02_37_Cath_F_Thief22,Face|...And she's gone.$k$pA rival, eh? Could be fun...$k$pJust you wait, Nina! I'll find something
even better next time! Your eyes will
bulge right out of their sockets!$k$p$Sbs150|
